EmailTemplate.subject: Discover the Newest Way to Win in Subprime
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Demo <http://www.vauto.com/used-car-software/provision/subprime-booking/> Provision's New Subprime Booking Soon.
Having trouble viewing this email? Click here <http://skmgroupwork.com/vauto/email/vauto001/vauto001.html> to see it online.

<https://twitter.com/vAuto>
<http://www.vauto.com/used-car-software/provision/subprime-booking/>
Visit us for a
Demo
at the
vAuto Booth
#1718S!
<http://www.vauto.com/used-car-software/provision/subprime-booking/>
Dealers who struggle with subprime customers often think it's a financing problem. In reality, it's an inventory problem — they don't have the right cars or they don't quickly match those cars to customers early in the sales process.
With Subprime Booking, you can:
> Instantly find subprime inventory at an auction
> Easily determine the subprime potential of every appraisal you make
> Verify multiple lenders' criteria against any appraisal at once
> Match the right customers to the right cars before wasting time in the sales process
Experience Subprime Booking for yourself. Visit our booth at NADA 2015 in San Francisco, or schedule your demo today <http://www.vauto.com/used-car-software/provision/subprime-booking/>!
<http://www.vauto.com/used-car-software/provision/subprime-booking/>
